text: The Wild Wild West is an American Western, espionage and science fiction television series created by Michael Garrison. It aired on the television network CBS for four seasons from September 17, 1965, to April 11, 1969. The show is about two Secret Service agents James West (Robert Conrad) and Artemus Gordon (Ross Martin) working together to protect U.S. President Ulysses S. Grant. Two satirical comedy television movie sequels were made with the original cast in 1979 and 1980. An adaption of the show, Wild Wild West, was released in 1999. ==References== Category:1965 television series debuts Category:1969 television series endings Category:1960s American television series
title: The Wild Wild West
